item.description:
Our Lady Valerie Wales has lost her beloved father.

We will be collecting any donations towards a flower arrangement on Thursday June 23rd. Services will be held in Fayetteville, NC.

The Obituary reads:

Mr. Otis Clark, age 81 of 917 Bramblewood Court Fayetteville NC departed this life on June 20, 2011. He was retired Army Cpt
Funeral services will be held on Friday 10:30 AM in the Wiseman Mortuary Chapael. Burial will follow in Sandhills State Veterans Cemetery.
The family will receive friends at the home.

Wiseman Mortuary, Inc. 431 Cumberland Street  Fayetteville, NC 28301

 

Thank you in advance

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

Our weekly Class & Practice

 

 

 

Beginners Welcome!!
Men, Women, Singles, Couples

*** Please wear comfortable clothes and smooth bottom shoes (NO SNEAKERS, MARKING SOLES or RUBBER BOTTOMS)! ***


Doors open at 6:00pm.
Instructional Hour starts @6:15 p.m.** --- Bring your Steppin' notebook
Courtesy Note:: Please be on time.
Practice outside of class is expected and necessary.

Steppin'Practice 6:00 pm-8:30 pm.

**Certified Instruction provided by The Original Steppers of Boston Inc 2006 Team**

Full Bar!!
We welcome you to stop by to get an idea of what Steppin' Chicago Style is all about. There is a $10 participation fee to get on the dance floor, first visit is FREE. We ask that you patronize the bar and tip the staff for their services.

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: "Chicago Style" Steppin' Dance Class & Practice @The Den - Updated Announcement
